        if (/(^\/pl)(\/|$)/.test(window.location.pathname)) {
          let redirectUrl = window.location.origin;
          const search = window.location.search;
          const params = search.substring(1).split('&').reduce((acc, param) => {
            const [name, value] = param.split('=');
            acc[name] = value;
            return acc;
          }, { pl_id: '', pl_video: '' });
          if (params.pl_video) {
            redirectUrl += '/play/embed/' + params.pl_video;
            window.location.replace(redirectUrl);
          }
        }
      }
    </script>

      --button-promo-icon-fill-active: #FFF;

      --button-promo-gradient-background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FE6E8B 0%, #E459E8 100%);
      --button-promo-icon-fill: url(#ya-summarization-icon-promo);

    
        --button-promo-text-color: transparent;
        --button-promo-background-color: #FFF;
        --button-promo-gradient-background-hover: linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(255,231,236) 0%, rgb(251,230,252) 100%);
    
    }
    .ya-video-summarization-button_search-app.ya-video-summarization-button_promo,
    .ya-video-summarization-button_search-app.ya-video-summarization-button_soft-promo {
      --icon-fill-gradient: #FF3333;
      --button-promo-gradient-background: #F8604A;
      --button-promo-gradient-background-hover: #FFF;
      --button-promo-icon-fill: #F8604A;
      
      
      --button-promo-text-gradient: #F8604A;
      --button-promo-text-color: #F8604A;
    
    }
    .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-button_soft-promo svg path,
    .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-button_promo svg path {
      fill: var(--button-promo-icon-fill);
    }

    .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-button_promo .ya-video-summarization-preview-label {
      color: transparent;
      background: var(--button-promo-text-gradient);
      background-clip: text;
      -webkit-background-clip: text;
      -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }

    .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-button_promo .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
    .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-button_promo .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
      background-color: var(--button-promo-background-color);
    }

    
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover.ya-video-summarization-button_promo .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover.ya-video-summarization-button_promo .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container,

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button {
    /* Theme colors. */
    
    --button-background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    --button-background-color-active: rgb(209, 209, 209);
    --button-background-color-hover: rgb(232, 232, 232);
    --button-background-color-click: rgb(217, 217, 217);
    --button-text-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.66);
    --button-text-color-active: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    --button-icon-fill: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.66);
    --button-icon-fill-active: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    position: absolute;
    top: 8px;
    left: 8px;
    height: 32px;
    max-width: calc(70% - 16px);
    padding: 0;
    border: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: transparent;
    pointer-events: none;
    user-select: none;
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button_hidden,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button_hidden .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button_hidden .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-label {
    font-family: YS Text, "Segoe UI", BlinkMacSystemFont, Arial, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 20px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    padding: 6px 8px 6px 32px;
    color: var(--button-text-color);
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    height: 32px;
    padding: 6px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    opacity: 1;
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    pointer-events: auto;
    border-radius: 8px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: var(--button-background-color);
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    margin-left: -32px;
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button svg {
    z-index: 10;
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button svg path {
    fill: var(--button-icon-fill);
  }

  
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover  .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    background-color: var(--button-background-color-hover);
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:hover  .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    background-color: var(--button-background-color-hover);
  }


  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:active .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button:active .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    background-color: var(--button-background-color-click);
  }
  
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-preview-button_active .ya-video-summarization-preview-label {
    color: var(--button-text-color-active);
  }
  
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-preview-button_active svg path {
    fill: var(--button-icon-fill-active);
  }

  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-preview-button_active .ya-video-summarization-preview-icon-container,
  .ya-video-summarization-preview-button.ya-video-summarization-preview-button_active .ya-video-summarization-preview-label-container {
    background-color: var(--button-background-color-active);
  }
